definitions.text: a form of entertainment that enacts a story by sound and a sequence of images giving the illusion of continuous movement
examples: they went to a movie every Saturday night
the film was shot on location

definitions.text: a medium that disseminates moving pictures
examples: this story would be good cinema

definitions.text: photographic material consisting of a base of celluloid covered with a photographic emulsion; used to make negatives or transparencies

examples: the table was covered with a film of dust

definitions.text: a thin sheet of (usually plastic and usually transparent) material used to wrap or cover things
make a film or photograph of something
